code: import axios from"axios";export function RegisterUser(data){return axios.post("https://gokulfsserver.herokuapp.com/register",data);}export function loginuser(data){return axios.post("https://gokulfsserver.herokuapp.com/login",data);}export function Getsingletask(id){return axios.post("https://gokulfsserver.herokuapp.com/getsingletask/".concat(id));}export function Sentemail(data){return axios.post("https://gokulfsserver.herokuapp.com/email",data);}export function Updatesingletask(id,data){return axios.post("https://gokulfsserver.herokuapp.com/updatesingletask/".concat(id),data);}export function Resetpwd(id,data){return axios.post("https://gokulfsserver.herokuapp.com/resetpassword/".concat(id),data);}export function Addtask(data){return axios.post("https://gokulfsserver.herokuapp.com/task",data,{headers:{authorization:window.localStorage.getItem("app_token1")}});}export function Gettask(id,data){return axios.post("https://gokulfsserver.herokuapp.com/gettask/".concat(id),data,{headers:{authorization:window.localStorage.getItem("app_token1")}});}export function Updatetask(id,data){return axios.post("https://gokulfsserver.herokuapp.com/taskupdate/".concat(id),data,{headers:{authorization:window.localStorage.getItem("app_token1")}});}export function Getalltask(id){return axios.get("https://gokulfsserver.herokuapp.com/getalltask/".concat(id),{headers:{authorization:window.localStorage.getItem("app_token1")}});}export function Deletetask(id){return axios.delete("https://gokulfsserver.herokuapp.com/deletetask/".concat(id),{headers:{authorization:window.localStorage.getItem("app_token1")}});}
